page.title: 05GARDENING
page.content: Gardening in Ashley Green & Whelpley is limited by the soil, which is alkaline exept in patches, so lime haters do not flourish.There are many large gardens & hardy annuals are raised or bought for summer bedding. The main varieties are; Nemesia, Phlox,Alyssum,Lobelia,French & African Marigolds,Begonia & Antirrhinum. Other plants used extensively are;Roses, Dehlias,Chrysanthemum,& also many perennial plants & shrubs. Veg are also grown & the allotments are sited bhind Ashley Green village hall,& are let to villagers on an annual basis. The stony soil makes the growing of root veg difficult.The main crops are peas & beans,cabbage,lettuce,parsnips, turnips.Tomatoes,aubergines & green peppers are grown in private greenhou- ses.Cooking apples,plums,& all soft fruits are grown & thrive.
